ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: No specific form. Request must be accompanied by proof it is a 501(c)3 charity, copy of most recent IRS Form 990, most recent financial statements and what the organizer intends to do with the grant.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: Applications are accepted anytime. Response in 3 months.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: The Foundation awards grants to charities that provide assistance to youth (persons under age 18) and elderly (persons over age 70) of Tom Green County, Texas and adjoining counties.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: Purchase the building next door for use in treating learning disabilities of students.
Purchase beds and clothing for school-aged children.
Construction of a multi-sports arena for boys.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.RecipientPersonNm: San Angelo Museum of Fine Arts
GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: Take-home educational packets & online & social media related video production for youth and children.
Renovate property for camp area for children.
Purchase a new computer server for school.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.RecipientPersonNm: Tom Green County Friends of the Lib
GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: Renovate the children/youth portion of the North Branch of the Library.
Remodel part of old skating rink for children's clinic.
Vision aids to children with vision problems as identified by region 15.
Cooking equipment for cafeteria serving elderly residents.
